pkgmetadata.longdescription: # shopify_apis Collection of custom shopify functionsConfig file needed at ~/.Shopify-Config.json which will be used by com_digitalruiz_shopify_http_client```{ "shopify_store_name": "YOUR-STORE-NAME", "shopify_admin_api_version": "API VERSION", "shopify_access_token": "ACCESS TOKEN"}```example use:```from com_digitalruiz_shopify_tools import shopify_tools```
